name: Essar Telecom Infrastructure
overview: Essar Telecom Infrastructure Pvt. Ltd. (ETIL) is part of one of the leading Business conglomerate, ESSAR with an Enterprise value of over US $20 billion (Rs. 80,000 crores). The Essar Group has its interests spanning the manufacturing and the service sectors: Steel, Oil& Gas, Power, Telecom & BPO, Shipping & Logistics and Construction. The synergy that ETIL derives from its Group companies; Essar Steel (quality raw material), Essar Constructions (Project management best practices), Essar Shipping & Logistics (Logistics and Supply Chain Management) and Vodafone Essar (Telecom services) puts us in a unique position to meet the infrastructure requirements of a Telecom Service Provider and fulfill the same in the most efficient and cost effective manner. ETIL is committed to provide the best Passive Infrastructure Provisioning Service to the Telecom Service providers and continue innovating to meet the growing demand optimally.

acquisition.source_description: Transcend Infrastructure (American Tower) to acquire Essar Telecom Infrastructure

offices.address2: Building- B, 2nd Floor, BKC- LBS Road Junction
